name: Herbert's Defense
description:
Herbert's Defense - an entry for the 1 Button Jam https://itch.io/jam/1-button-jam-2022

Defend Herbert's tower using his tower of elements and upgrade your elements for the increasingly dangerous onslaught of foes!

Play by pressing any of the following Action Keys: 

  • Q, W, E, R, T, Y, A, S, D, Enter, Tab, Space

Esc closes the game.

Balancing may be off with enemies either being too hard or easy, will need to playtest a lot more!

Let me know what you think :)
